Plot: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.
Title: The Sweet Hereafter
Actors: Ian Holm, Caerthan Banks, Sarah Polley, Tom McCamus
tomatoConsensus: Director Atom Egoyan examines tragedy and its aftermath with intelligence and empathy.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 33 wins & 52 nominations.
